patterns.name: Hub-and-Spoke with Centralized Inspection
patterns.used_for: Standard enterprise network segmentation with shared services, centralized egress/ingress inspection, and consistent routing control.
notes: Best for multi-VPC/VNet environments and shared security controls.
Pairs naturally with landing zone + centralized logging.

patterns.name: Regulated Security Baseline
patterns.used_for: Baseline controls for regulated workloads (CJIS/FIPS/HIPAA-style): identity hardening, encryption, audit logging, threat detection, and private connectivity preference.

patterns.name: WORM Retention + Evidence Vault
patterns.used_for: Write-once-read-many retention, immutability, and evidentiary storage for sensitive records and audit needs.

patterns.name: Centralized Logging + SIEM Integration
patterns.used_for: Central collection, retention, and analysis of logs/events with integrations into SIEM/SOAR for response workflows.
